::: {#hero-heading}

I am a Professor at School of Economics, Quaid-i-Azam University, Islamabad. 

My work is about Applied Econometrics, Data and Development Economics.


## Education 

Pakistan Institute of Development Economics | Islamabad, Pakistan 

PhD in Economics | July 2024

BZU | Multan, Pakistan

MSc in Statistics 

## Experience

I have published widely both in Applied Economics and Statistics both in national and international journals.  
I have also been serving as a trainer for different organizations in the field of data analysis and econometrics. 
My expertise is in R, Stata, Python, EVIEWS, and Excel.

:::
